content: Lifestyle Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 12 Mar 2019how to optimise wedding payments from individual vendors?Apart from the wedding banquet that can be paid using credit cards, what else can a couple do to earn cashback/miles from using individual vendors ie photographers/make-up artists that accept mainly fund transfer as payment?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Han Jinyuan Larry, Senior Lifeguard at CertisLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 27 Mar 2019Each hotel have tie up with their preferred credit card. While you are talking with their Banquet Manager or Sales Manager, they can better advise you which credit card to use first for points. A second different credit card for cash back, vice versa.0 comments0
